name: StopTime Drive
description: StopTime Drive is a unique turn-based racing puzzle game that combines arcade racing with a top-down view and an opportunity to think over each move. A slightly oldschool and hardcore, with the original mechanics and different ways for passing!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP2 or better) / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
